name: Minion's Mobile Market
description:
Mouse - Control the Camera

WASD/Arrow Keys - Move

Space - Set Up / Tear Down Shop

You have three days to earn as much gold as you can! Sneak around the dungeon while avoiding the other monsters and supplying any heroes in need by setting up shop nearby. You can tell when a hero is in need by the big "!" above their head.

Heroes will be lured in by the sound of you opening up shop. Just give them a moment to peruse your wares. Before you know it, you'll have a shiny new gold piece, and they'll continue along their way.

The deeper you delve, the more gold you will get for your sales.
